tool_description: Analyzes images or brand assets to extract dominant colors and generate harmonious color palettes for consistent visual branding.

source_image_url.description: URL or path to the source image for color extraction

error_messages: Image file not accessible: Ensure source_image_url points to a valid image file.
Invalid palette size: Specify a number between 3 and 8 for palette_size.
Unsupported image format: Use common image formats (JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP).
usage: Provide a source image URL and optionally specify how many colors to extract. The tool returns a palette with hex codes and color names.

primary_colors.description: Array of hex color codes for the dominant colors

color_names.description: Human-readable names for each extracted color

palette_harmony.description: Description of the color harmony type (complementary, analogous, triadic)
